item.description:
An invitation to join us for a sacred evening of yoga ritual by candlelight - clothing optional. Deepen your pratice, expand intimace with yourself and others and Discover freedom from shame, guilt and suffering and move closer to love, bliss and divine truth. The simple act of removing our clothes enables us to break away from limiting body and belief patterns and identities. All shapes and sizes welcome as we celebrate the divinty of the temple we have entered into this life with. Couples Welcome!

"Naked yoga is about accepting the totality of the form of the body and immersing into the ecstasy and absolute potential of the body soul union. Unlike other spiritual philosophies, practices or traditions that work to transcend the body, this practice celebrates the body fully with reverence, joy and abandon." - Isis Phoenix, Sensual Shaman, NYC
www.nakedyoganyc.com

6:30-7pm - Introductions & Tea
7-8pm - Yoga Class - clothing optional, scarves welcome
8-9pm - Guided Full Body Meditaiton

*Infrared Sauna available from 9-10pm for an additional $10 fee

Please bring your own mat , towel or blanket and candle that represents your innermost sacred self
item.name: Candlelight NAKED Yoga Ceremony & Full Body Meditation
